jobDescription: Electrician  We are currently hiring Electricians with 2 years of experience in a commercial environment. Electrician must be certified journeyman or apprentice. We have an immediate need in the San Jose Area. Please send your resume to jaime@outsource.net for consideration. Electrician Duties: Cutting, bending, threading and running electrical conduit materials  Experience with EMT and Rigid  Ability to use hand bender and must have own tools  Installing and connecting wires to circuit breakers, transformers, outlets, or other components and systems  Current state journeyman or trainee license is required Electrician Compensation: Starting pay $25 - $40 or depending on experience  Weekly Pay
